Our first class meeting will focus on Chapters [1](https://peopleanalytics-regression-book.org/gitbook/inf-model.html), [2](https://peopleanalytics-regression-book.org/gitbook/the-basics-of-the-r-programming-language.html), and [3](https://peopleanalytics-regression-book.org/gitbook/found-stats.html) of __Handbook of Regression Modeling in People Analytics__.

```{r}
# url of data set 
url <- "http://peopleanalytics-regression-book.org/data/salespeople.csv"
# load the data set and store it as a dataframe called salespeople
salespeople <- read.csv(url)
library(GGally)
# convert performance and promotion to categorical
salespeople$promoted <- as.factor(salespeople$promoted)
salespeople$performance <- as.factor(salespeople$performance)
# pairplot of salespeople
ggpairs(salespeople)
```
